name: Atokrad Part 1: Into The Dark
description:
Hello, this is my first game, Atokrad Part 1: Into The Dark, this is a game about the origin of my OC Atokrad, a creepypasta, and follows a book that I'm writing on fiction press. The game will be edited on a chapter by chapter basis and the early access demo is up now.

The early access demo will be only half or even less than half of the Intro to the game and will mainly be a concept test and has features that may continue throughout the rest of the game, please let me know what you think!

The game is being written in quest, so first, you will need to download quest 5.8 or later to play.

The entire game will be free!
